reg_info.act_under: Wild Rice Harvesting Act   Loi sur la moisson du riz sauvage

content.content: 1. The areas shown on the plans filed in the office of the Registrar of Regulations at Toronto as Nos. 294 to 297, both inclusive, are wild rice harvesting areas, designated by the identifying number and initials shown thereon. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The areas shown on the plans filed in the office of the Registrar of Regulations at Toronto as Nos. 294 to 297, both inclusive, are wild rice harvesting areas, designated by the identifying number and initials shown thereon. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, s. 1.

content.content: 2. An application for a licence to harvest wild rice on Crown lands shall be in Form 1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. An application for a licence to harvest wild rice on Crown lands shall be in Form 1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, s. 2.

content.content: 3. A licence to harvest wild rice on Crown lands shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. A licence to harvest wild rice on Crown lands shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, s. 3.

content.content: 4. The fee for a licence in Form 2 is $1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. The fee for a licence in Form 2 is $1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, s. 4.

content.content: 5. A licence in Form 2 expires with the 31st day of October next following the date of issue. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. A licence in Form 2 expires with the 31st day of October next following the date of issue. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, s. 5.

content.content: 6. A licence in Form 2 is not valid unless it is signed by the licensee. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, s. 6.
content.raw_html: 6. A licence in Form 2 is not valid unless it is signed by the licensee. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, s. 6.

content.content: 7. A licence shall not be transferred without the approval of the Deputy Minister. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, s. 7. FORM 1   APPLICATION FOR A LICENCE TO HARVEST WILD RICE ON CROWN LANDS Wild Rice Harvesting Act   R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, Form 1. FORM 2   19 ………. LICENCE TO HARVEST WILD RICE ON CROWN LANDS Wild Rice Harvesting Act  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, Form 2.
content.raw_html:
7. A licence shall not be transferred without the approval of the Deputy Minister. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1097, s. 7.
